io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.content

Class WebAnnotationResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.content.WebAnnotationResource

  • @Path(value="/webannotation")
public class WebAnnotationResource
extends Object
    Resource for delivering content documents such as ALTO and plain full-text.
